name: Elemental Runner
description:
PC Controls: 

Up/Down Arrows = Jump/Fall

Spacebar = Shoot

Q, W, E = Switch elements (Fire, Water, Ice)

Mobile Controls:

Swipe up/down = Jump/Fall

Press buttons to shoot and switch elements

Instructions:

Keep running for as long as possible! Switch elements depending on what's in front of you:

Fire kills Ice enemies, Ice kills Water enemies, Water kills Fire enemies.

Switch to the same element in order to walk through barriers.

Commentary:

The idea for this game was to create a fun, replayable, and mechanically skillful game for mobile users.  I've always enjoyed endless runners and spending hours trying to get a new high score in them.  This is a game that implements traditional runner features with different platforms and enemies, but also has the elemental twist which requires quick thinking from the user.

Art/Audio:

A large majority of our art is original, made by Tracy Zhu specifically for this project.  The rest were found online and in free asset packs.

All of the audio was found online on royalty free websites.
